<script>(function(){
'use strict';
var stats = window.ttiStats = {};
var addListener = function (name, fn) {
if ('addEventListener' in document) {
document.addEventListener(name, fn);
} else {
document.attachEvent('on' + name, fn);
}
};
var removeListener = function (name, fn) {
if ('removeEventListener' in document) {
document.removeEventListener(name, fn);
} else {
document.detachEvent('on' + name, fn);
}
};
var baseTimeStamp = (new Date()).getTime();
var onClick = function onClick() {
stats.click = (new Date()).getTime() - baseTimeStamp;
removeListener('click', onClick);
};
var onScroll = function onScroll() {
stats.scroll = (new Date()).getTime() - baseTimeStamp;
removeListener('scroll', onScroll);
};
addListener('click', onClick);
addListener('scroll', onScroll);
}());
</script>

<div class="favorite-hotels">
<h3 class="favorite-hotels__headline">Hotels That Guests Love in Chicago
<ul class="favorite-hotels__list">
<li class="favorite-hotels__item  __first ">
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-info">
<h4 class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name">
<a class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name__link" href="/hotel/us/bridgestreet-at-state-and-grand.html" target="_blank">
Bridgestreet at State and Grand
</a>
</h4>
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-image">
<img class="favorite-hotels__img" src="https://t-ec.bstatic.com/images/hotel/270x200/132/13288909.jpg">
</div>
</div>
<div class="guests-reviews__review">
<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>Very convenient location, close to the Chicago River and Magnificent Mile. The apartment was large with a fully equipped kitchen and a very nice city view on the 26th floor. The Wi-Fi connection was very good.<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>
</div>
</li>
<li class="favorite-hotels__item   ">
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-info">
<h4 class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name">
<a class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name__link" href="/hotel/us/raffaello.html" target="_blank">
Raffaello Hotel
</a>
</h4>
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-image">
<img class="favorite-hotels__img" src="https://t-ec.bstatic.com/images/hotel/270x200/171/17126506.jpg">
</div>
</div>
<div class="guests-reviews__review">
<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>Cute old building. Our king suit felt like a little 1 bedroom apartment. Very cozy, although our view was of the fire escape of the building behind us but Chicago is a tight city so I didnt mind.<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>
</div>
</li>
<li class="favorite-hotels__item   ">
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-info">
<h4 class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name">
<a class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name__link" href="/hotel/us/ohio-house-motel.html" target="_blank">
Ohio House Motel
</a>
</h4>
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-image">
<img class="favorite-hotels__img" src="https://s-ec.bstatic.com/images/hotel/270x200/683/68387582.jpg">
</div>
</div>
<div class="guests-reviews__review">
<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>Really helpful and friendly staff, who went above and beyond when I booked the wrong room, providing an (extremely comfortable) inflatable mattress. Wifi (traditionally not great in the US) was brilliant, and next time I visit Chicago, I'll be looking here before think about booking elsewhere.<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>
</div>
</li>
<li class="favorite-hotels__item   favhotels__longer-review">
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-info">
<h4 class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name">
<a class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name__link" href="/hotel/us/embassy-suites-chicago-downtown-lakefront.html" target="_blank">
Embassy Suites Chicago Downtown Magnificent Mile
</a>
</h4>
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-image">
<img class="favorite-hotels__img" src="https://t-ec.bstatic.com/images/hotel/270x200/430/43038248.jpg">
</div>
</div>
<div class="guests-reviews__review">
<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>Our stay here was more than we expected! The staff was very friendly and helpful. Our room was huge and comfortable; like a little apartment. I guess we missed the part about the complimentary bar. You get 4 free drinks each! The breakfast was excellent and what you hope for when you see a free breakfast is offered. Great location and close to everything. We definitely hope we get to visit Chicago again and will definitely be staying here when we go!<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>
</div>
</li>
<li class="favorite-hotels__item __last  favhotels__longer-review">
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-info">
<h4 class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name">
<a class="favorite-hotels__hotel-name__link" href="/hotel/us/coast.html" target="_blank">
Premier Luxury at the Coast
</a>
</h4>
<div class="favorite-hotels__hotel-image">
<img class="favorite-hotels__img" src="https://s-ec.bstatic.com/images/hotel/270x200/277/27783330.jpg">
</div>
</div>
<div class="guests-reviews__review">
<span class="guests-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
<p class="guests-reviews__content">
<span class="cr_review_quote left">“</span>It's a 1b1b apartment actually. So the space is big enough, which is absolutely larger than any other hotel you can find at downtown Chicago. The view at the balcony is also awesome, with a glimpse of Navy Pier and Hudson River right in front of you. Cooking is also allowed and there're even bowls plates and glasses on the table already.<span class="cr_review_quote right">”
</p>
</div>
</li>

<div id="revc_write_a_review_login_intro" style="display:none;">
<h3>Verified reviews from real guests.</h3><p>We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from <strong>real, verified guests.</strong>
<div class="rlp-intro">
<div class="rlp-intro__container clearfix">
<h3 class="rlp-intro__title">How does it work?</h3>
<ul class="rlp-intro-how">
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--tickfull">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--tickfull">1</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-tickfull"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">It starts with a booking</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--citytrip">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--citytrip">2</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-citytrip"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">Followed by a trip</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--feedback">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--feedback">3</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-feedback"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">And finally, a review</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<p>If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.</p>
<div class="intro_footer">
<a href="https://secure.booking.com/reviewtimeline.html" class="revc_write_a_review_login_button">Sign in and leave a review</a>
</div>
</div>

List Your Property on Booking.com Find guests with ease and earn more Learn more All apartments in Chicago Hotels That Guests Love in Chicago Bridgestreet at State and Grand “ Very convenient location, close to the Chicago River and Magnificent Mile. The apartment was large with a fully equipped kitchen and a very nice city view on the 26th floor. The Wi-Fi connection was very good. ” Raffaello Hotel “ Cute old building. Our king suit felt like a little 1 bedroom apartment. Very cozy, although our view was of the fire escape of the building behind us but Chicago is a tight city so I didnt mind. ” Ohio House Motel “ Really helpful and friendly staff, who went above and beyond when I booked the wrong room, providing an (extremely comfortable) inflatable mattress. Wifi (traditionally not great in the US) was brilliant, and next time I visit Chicago, I'll be looking here before think about booking elsewhere. ” Embassy Suites Chicago Downtown Magnificent Mile “ Our stay here was more than we expected! The staff was very friendly and helpful. Our room was huge and comfortable; like a little apartment. I guess we missed the part about the complimentary bar. You get 4 free drinks each! The breakfast was excellent and what you hope for when you see a free breakfast is offered. Great location and close to everything. We definitely hope we get to visit Chicago again and will definitely be staying here when we go! ” Premier Luxury at the Coast “ It's a 1b1b apartment actually. So the space is big enough, which is absolutely larger than any other hotel you can find at downtown Chicago. The view at the balcony is also awesome, with a glimpse of Navy Pier and Hudson River right in front of you. Cooking is also allowed and there're even bowls plates and glasses on the table already. ” You might also like these property types: Budget Hotels Romantic Hotels Design Hotels Spa Hotels Family Hotels Best Western Hotels Marriott Hotels Hilton Hotels Holiday Inn Hotels Five-star Hotels Four-star Hotels Three-star Hotels Hotels with Parking Hotels with Pools Hotels with jacuzzis Pet-friendly Hotels Hotels with WiFi Places to Stay Lodgings Flats Rooms Accommodations Luxury Hotels Search Hotels Check-in Date + / / Check-in Date Check-out Date + / / Check-out Date Are you traveling for work?
